reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 428/00: CANADIAN BUNGEE CODE OF SAFE PRACTICE
reg_info.reg_name_text: CANADIAN BUNGEE CODE OF SAFE PRACTICE
reg_info.act_under: Amusement Devices Act   Loi sur les attractions

content.content: 1. The Canadian Bungee Code of Safe Practice, as amended by the Director by order dated July 5, 2000, is hereby adopted by reference as a regulation under the Act.  O. Reg. 428/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Canadian Bungee Code of Safe Practice, as amended by the Director by order dated July 5, 2000, is hereby adopted by reference as a regulation under the Act. O. Reg. 428/00, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The standards, procedures and requirements of the Code shall be complied with by all persons who erect, operate or maintain a bungee ride or bungee type device as defined in the Code. O. Reg. 428/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The standards, procedures and requirements of the Code shall be complied with by all persons who erect, operate or maintain a bungee ride or bungee type device as defined in the Code. O. Reg. 428/00, s. 2.
